src = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp() + '.json'
with open(src, 'w+') as output:
    subprocess.check_call(['python3', '-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
        'arf-to-json', 'tests/test_data/ssg-fedora-ds-arf.xml',
        'xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_rule_package_abrt_removed'], stdout=
        output)
out_dir = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp()
out = subprocess.check_output(['python3', '-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
    'json-to-graph', '--off-web-browser', '--out', out_dir, src,
    'xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_rule_package_abrt_removed'])
tests.any_test_help.compare_results_html(os.path.join(out_dir, os.listdir(
    out_dir)[0]))
